page.title: 21Pirelli site Eastleigh
page.content:
The old Pirelli site has now been razed to the ground with a small area excepted. The huge perimeter wall which was camouflaged in the war to look like a terrace of houses has also gone.Now we have a mini village on the site with its streets named in remembrance of Pirellis and Eastleigh characters and places.

A new build is about to begin of flats for the elderly who require wardened accommodation.

Contribution by: Eileen Betteridge
